name: Siffrin
note:
<Battle Status Window Skin: Window_flash>
<Replace Attack: 7>
<Replace Attack: AttackS>

<Custom Face Image Eval>
////////////BASIC
if ($gameVariables.value(2) <= 2 ){
	//if timestopped
	if (user.isStateAffected(19)) {
	faceName = 'xxx_battle_1';
	faceIndex = 6;

	//if dead
	} else if (user.isStateAffected(1)) {
	faceName = 'xxx_battle_1';
	faceIndex = 5;

	//if attacking
	} else if (user.isStateAffected(54)) {
	faceName = 'xxx_battle_1';
	faceIndex = 2;

	//if healed/buffed
	} else if (user.isStateAffected(52)) {
	faceName = 'xxx_battle_1';
	faceIndex = 1;

	//if taking damage
	} else if (user.isStateAffected(53)) {
	faceName = 'xxx_battle_1';
	faceIndex = 3;

	//if 30%hp left
	} else if (user.hp / user.mhp <= 0.3) {
	faceName = 'xxx_battle_1';
	faceIndex = 4;

	//if basic
	} else if (user.hp / user.mhp <= 1) {
	faceName = 'xxx_battle_1';
	faceIndex = 0;
	}
};




</Custom Face Image Eval>
<Japanese Translation>
[name]:シフリン
</Japanese Translation>
